# NIDLTDOACoordinatesType

**Enumeration**

The possible coordinate types for Downlink Time-Difference-of-Arrival measurement updates.

## Declaration

```swift
enum NIDLTDOACoordinatesType
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NIDLTDOAMeasurement] class [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NIDLTDOAMeasurement/coordinates] property is of this type.

For more information on Downlink Time-Difference-of-Arrival measurements, see [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NIDLTDOAConfiguration].

## Identifying a coordinate type

- **NIDLTDOACoordinatesType.geodetic**: A coordinate type that specifies a latitude, longitude, and altitude triplet.
- **NIDLTDOACoordinatesType.relative**: A coordinate type that specifies a 3D Cartesian triplet.

## Creating a coordinate type

- **init(rawValue:)**: Initializes a coordinate type for a Downlink Time-Difference-of-Arrival measurement.

## Measurements

- **NIDLTDOAMeasurement**: Information from a Downlink Time-Difference-of-Arrival anchor that you use to derive a range estimate.
- **NIDLTDOAMeasurementType**: The possible phases of downlink positioning signals.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
